bibl.title: Cultural Transfer and the Evolution of Formal Aspects of Demotic Papyrus Contracts in Hellenistic Egypt.
bibl.note: Formal aspects. - Types of contracts. - Evolution of formal features. - Rationale behind these evolutions. - Identification in contracts and cultural transfer. - Conclusion.

bibl.title: Transferts culturels et droits dans le monde grec et hellénistique. Actes du colloque international (Reims, 14-17 mai 2008

bibl.seg: Depauw Mark, Cultural Transfer and the Evolution of Formal Aspects of Demotic Papyrus Contracts in Hellenistic Egypt.

Bernard Legras (Éd.), Transferts culturels et droits dans le monde grec et hellénistique. Actes du colloque international (Reims, 14-17 mai 2008 = Université Paris 1 Panthéon-Sorbonne. Histoire ancienne et médiévale. 110 (Paris, 2012) pp. 309-320, 3 graphiques, 2 tabl.
Formal aspects. - Types of contracts. - Evolution of formal features. - Rationale behind these evolutions. - Identification in contracts and cultural transfer. - Conclusion.
